title: DBS-Based Project Learning for Enhancing Engineering Problem-Solving Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Engineering Knowledge and Understanding of Problem-Solving Frameworks
context.additional_context: Asynchronous learning program for working professionals, aimed at enhancing practical problem-solving skills through real-world task integration

learning_goals: Over 80% of learners can independently derive solutions to real-world engineering problems by applying the Design-Build Studio (DBS) methodology
Through team-based collaborative projects, 90% of learners can present creative solutions in complex problem situations
In an online environment, 75% of learners acquire the ability to implement prototypes using simulation tools and digital fabrication technologies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
